title: Everyone disconnecting
body:
Hi. I was just in a game in which everybody was disconnecting (including me). Then the chat bar started telling everyone (incl me) that I was pausing the game. I actually dont even know how to!

Has this happened to anyone else?

replies.body: tell me ur ID ? is this guy in ur game ? Dirty Debbie

Not me, I'm fine, when I'm in game that is.

I currently cannot log in, though.
